column1: Here are 50 motivational quotes translated into Nigerian Pidgin English and formatted as a CSV file:

column2: quote
column3: pidgin

column2: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
column3: Na only way to do great work be say make you love wetin you dey do.

column2: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
column3: Your time dey limited, so no waste am dey live another person life.

column2: If you look at what you have in life, you’ll always have more. If you look at what you don’t have in life, you’ll never have enough.
column3: If you look wetin you get for life, you go always get more. If you look wetin you no get for life, you no go ever get enough.

column2: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
column3: You must expect great things from yourself before you fit do dem.

column2: Don’t limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
column3: No limit yourself. Many people dey limit themselves to wetin dem think say dem fit do. You fit go as far as your mind go let you. Wetin you believe, remember, na im you fit achieve.

column2: The best revenge is massive success.
column3: Di best revenge na massive success.

column2: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
column3: Eighty percent of success na to show up.

column2: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.
column3: Your positive action wey you combine with positive thinking go bring success.

column2: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
column3: You must do di things wey you think say you no fit do.

column2: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
column3: No try to be successful, but try to get value.

column2: Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don’t wish it were easier, wish you were better.
column3: Successful people dey do wetin unsuccessful people no dey willing to do. No dey wish say e go dey easy, wish say you go beta pass.

column2: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
column3: No one fit make you feel inferior without your consent.

column2: Limitations live only in our minds. But if we use our imaginations, our possibilities become limitless.
column3: Limitations dey only for our mind. But if we use our imagination, our possibilities go dey limitless.

column2: Don’t let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice.
column3: No let di noise of odas dia opinion overshadow your own inner voice.

column2: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
column3: All our dreams fit come true, if we get di courage to pursue dem.

column2: Do one thing every day that scares you.
column3: Do one thing everyday wey dey fear you.

column2: Happiness is not something readymade. It comes from your own actions.
column3: Happiness no be something wey don ready. E dey come from your own actions.

column2: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
column3: Every strike dey bring me closer to di next home run.

column2: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
column3: Believe say you fit do am and you don already reach half way.

column2: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
column3: Everything wey you don ever want dey for di other side of fear.

column2: We become what we think about.
column3: We go become wetin we dey think about.

column2: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do, so throw off the bowlines, sail away from safe harbor, catch the trade winds in your sails.  Explore, Dream, Discover.
column3: Twenty years from now you go dey more disappointed by di things wey you no do pass di ones you do, so comot di rope wey dey hold you, sail away from safe harbor, catch di trade winds for your sails. Explore, Dream, Discover.

column2: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.
column3: Life na 10% of wetin dey happen to me and 90% of how I dey react to am.

column2: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
column3: Di mind na everything. Wetin you think na im you go become.

column2: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
column3: Di best way to predict di future na to create am.

column2: You become what you believe.
column3: You go become wetin you believe.

column2: I didn’t come this far, to only come this far.
column3: I no come dis far, to only come dis far.

column2: There are no limits to what you can accomplish, except the limits you place on your own thinking.
column3: No dey limit to wetin you fit achieve, except di limit wey you put for your thinking.

column2: You are never too old to set another goal or dream a new dream.
column3: You never too old to set another goal or dream new dream.

column2: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
column3: No dey watch clock; do wetin e dey do. Just dey go dey go.

column2: Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don't wish it were easier; wish you were better.
column3: Successful people dey do wetin unsuccessful people no dey willing to do. No wish say e easy pass; wish say you beta pass.

column2: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
column3: If opportunity no knock, build door.

column2: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
column3: I never dream about success. Na work I work for am.

column2: Do not wait; the time will never be 'just right'. Start where you stand, and work with whatever tools you may have at your command, and better tools will be found as you go along.
column3: No wait; di time no go ever 'just dey right'. Start from where you dey, and work with any tool wey you get for your hand, and you go find beta tools as you dey go along.

column2: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
column3: No let yesterday take up too much of today.

column2: You don't drown by falling in water. You drown by staying there.
column3: You no go drown if you fall inside water. You go drown if you stay there.

column2: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
column3: E no matter how slow you dey go as long as you no stop.

column2: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
column3: Our greatest weakness dey for giving up. Di most sure way to succeed na to always try one more time.

column2: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
column3: Fall seven times and stand up eight.

column2: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
column3: Di only place wia success dey come before work na for dictionary.

column2: Don’t be afraid to give your best to what seemingly are small jobs. Every time you conquer one it makes you that much stronger. If you do the little jobs well, the big ones will tend to take care of themselves.
column3: No fear to give your best to wetin look like small work. Every time you conquer one e dey make you dat much stronger. If you do di small work well, di big ones go tend to take care of themselves.

column2: Focus on your goal. Don't look in any direction but ahead.
column3: Focus on your goal. No look any direction but front.

column2: Our lives are a sum total of the choices we have made.
column3: Our lives be sum total of di choices wey we don make.

column2: Success usually comes to those who are too busy looking for it.
column3: Success dey usually come to those wey too busy dey find am.

column2: If you want something new, you have to stop doing something old.
column3: If you wan something new, you gats stop to dey do something old.

column2: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
column3: Start where you dey. Use wetin you get. Do wetin you fit do.

column2: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
column3: Try before. Fail before. E no matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better.

column2: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
column3: Di only way to do great work na to love wetin you dey do.

column2: If you hear a voice within you say ’you cannot paint,' then by all means paint and that voice will be silenced.
column3: If you hear voice inside you dey talk say ’you no fit paint,' den paint am wella and dat voice go keep quiet.

column2: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
column3: Success no be di key to happiness. Happiness na di key to success. If you love wetin you dey do, you go succeed.
